goals: 拓展學生對於科技管理領域思維
幫助讓學生對於研究方法之使用
syllabus:
Course Objective:

1\. To provide the new and professional knowledge in the field of technology management and enhance students’ capability of doing research.

2\. To discuss the professional research method and help students to understand the skills of doing research.

3. The course aims to help Management of Technology (MOT) major students understand the most up-to-date trends of MOT research through selected papers from the leading journals, such as Research Policy, Strategic Management Journal, Academy of Management Journal, and Organization Science, etc.
